item.title: Follow?
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

[quote=“Lagex, post:13, topic:197906”]Both of you go hang yourselves.
We never said “command”.
We’re talking about right clicks.
Please read ok?

Thanks!

PS if you don’t act like an idiot, moparscapers wont treat you like the idiots you are.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2008, 12:47:47 AM[/size][hr]By the way, I probably know a lot more Java than you.
I have 4 years experience in C++.
Also, I am one of the first users to have a very successful community.
I am no longer viewing this post because there is no progress being made.[/quote]
You’re no longer viewing it because you’re a noob and you know you got your ass kicked.
Right clicking follow vs a command can be as easy as calling the same method, don’t be a dumbfuck.
Also, your community is /fail. Honestly.
Try to accomplish something like RuneFusion, my friend runs it.
He also programmed a scratch server for it.
http://www.runefusion.net/

You fail, deal with it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

Lagex. It’s called a Right-Click COMMAND stupid.

1st of all: Hanging myself is a form of depressive display. I’m not depressed, just annoyed.
2nd of all: Reading includes knowing what your talking about. When one person, not saying who, (Lagex), doesn’t know what the hell java is, it gets annoying, and reading for THAT PERSON gets difficult.
3rd of all: I’m quitting this sucky community. Your joining it. DING! Another genius out, and one more stupid fucker in!

God Moparscape! Lmao.

;)Sorry you don’t understand what people say…

Admit you’re wrong and be done with it, nobody will judge you differently.
A following “command” will make a player follow another player.
Which, if I’m not wrong, is the concept of following
[/quote]
